action.text: Ruled out of order by the chair.
Motion to waive the Budget Act with respect to amendment SA 3114 rejected in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 44 - 51. Record Vote Number: 472.
Point of order that the amendment violates section 306 of the Congressional Budget Act raised in Senate with respect to amendment SA 3114.
Amendment SA 3114 proposed by Senator Merkley to Amendment SA 3411. To limit recissions of funding.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Motion to waive the Budget Act with respect to amendment SA 3114 rejected in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 44 - 51. Record Vote Number: 472.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3114 proposed by Senator Merkley to Amendment SA 3411.
